count.title: Global Management Award
count.text: The global management bonus bonus pool is open 24 hours a day. The bonus of the prize pool is 16% of the total amount of the day. The bonus of each level is 1/4 of the prize pool. The bonus of each level is divided equally by all users of that level. A user can merge multiple levels if the conditions are met.

tabText.text4:
• An account can only accept one investment before exiting, and can continue to invest after exiting.
  • The static dividend is 0.3% per day.
  • If everything goes out, 1-10 is 3 times the investment amount, 11-30 is 4 times the investment amount, and more than 31 is 5 times the investment amount.
  • Dynamic awards directly push several people to take several generations.
  • Dynamic recommendations are in accordance with: 10%-3%-3%-3%...a total of six generations, get dynamic rewards, and withdraw instantly.
  • The management prize will be drawn after the designated time, and the prize will arrive directly.
  • If no one meets the management bonus conditions, the bonus will be lost automatically.
